body: PS: To be fair, one might argue that in this case, since we have a single argument, it is incorrect. See also: https://play.golang.org/p/LYF_I6JW0J . But we've been living with this for years now; changing it would cause unnecessary formatting changes in a lot of code and lead to unnecessary churn. Let's leave this for the future (perhaps as part of a larger gofmt format update). Unfortunate.
